info.name: /badges
info.description: Display your or another user's badges. All the badges are global and can be negociated with other users. You can view all the badges here:
examples: /badges @duda - Display the badges of the user `duda`.

anyBadge: You still don't have any badge. Conquer your badges interacting with the bot and the community.
alreadyHave: Ups, I think I already gived you this gift, can I say "I love you" instead? I love you ðŸ’–.
